attributes.action: Ban the use of face masks/coverings in educational settings.
attributes.additional_details:
The Chief Medical Officers from all four nations in the United Kingdom have made it clear that overall risks to children from coronavirus (COVID-19) in relation to education settings is low and that the risks associated with not being in school certainly outweigh those of being in school. 

On the basis of current evidence, face coverings will not generally be necessary in the classroom even where social distancing is not possible.
attributes.background:
Discourage and stop promoting the use of face coverings in educational settings such as schools. 

Scrap all COVID-19 guidance for schools and allow for a normal return to education that our children so desperately need.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban the use of face masks in schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577831

Remove recommendation that face coverings be used in classrooms: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576845
